English: How could this be...
What in the world... is going on here?
Search all these houses! I want every single room turned inside out!
Spanish: ¡Busquen en todas estas casas! ¡Quiero cada habitación al revés!

English: Let go of me...! No! You can't...
Trying to resist? Too late, you filthy Chernos!
Just run! Don't worry about me... Save... our child...
Spanish: ¡Sólo corre! No te preocupes por mí... Salva... a nuestro hijo...

English: Mama... Mama...!
Forget about the civilians! Hold the line first! There are too many masked goons coming!
Spanish: ¡Olvídate de los civiles! ¡Primero mantengan la línea! ¡Vienen demasiados matones enmascarados!

English: Don't give the cops any time to rest! Keep attacking!
Spanish: ¡No les den tiempo a los policías para descansar! ¡¡Sigan atacando!!

English: Where are our reinforcements?! We're going to get overrun...
Spanish: ¡¿Dónde están nuestros refuerzos?! Vamos a ser invadidos...

English: Attack, attack!!
What's going on...?! Why... Why is Reunion doing this...?
Spanish: ¡¿Qué está pasando...?! Por qué... ¿Por qué Reunión está haciendo esto...?

English: After all these years, the wolves in sheep's clothing finally bare their fangs.
Spanish: Después de todos estos años, los lobos con piel de oveja finalmente muestran sus colmillos.

English: The Infected... they, they're attacking the Ursus troops!
Spanish: Los infectados... ellos, ¡están atacando a las tropas de Ursus!

English: But why?! Challenging the Ursus government like this is basically suicide!
Spanish: ¡¿Pero por qué?! ¡Desafiar al gobierno de Ursus así es básicamente un suicidio!

English: No, look at how fierce this attack is. This must have been a planned operation.
Spanish: No, mira lo feroz que es este ataque. Esto debe haber sido una operación planificada.

English: The place we rescued Doctor from was supposed to be top secret... but they somehow still managed to infiltrate it.
Spanish: El lugar del que rescatamos al Doctor se suponía que era alto secreto... pero de alguna manera se las arreglaron para infiltrarse.

English: It's possible that Reunion's attack has already spread through Chernobog in its entirety.
Spanish: Es posible que el ataque de Reunión ya se haya extendido por todo Chernobog.

English: No... How, how can that be...
Shhhh!
Have you found any of those fleeing Chernos yet?
Spanish: ¿Has encontrado ya a alguno de esos Chernos que huyeron?

English: I'm still looking!
Good, don't let a single one get away!
Spanish: Bien, ¡que no se escape ni uno!

English: Those cold-blooded beasts... I'll make them pay for what they did to my family!
Spanish: Esas bestias de sangre fría... ¡Les haré pagar por lo que le hicieron a mi familia!

English: (*cough*)
What was that?
Over there!
(Mmfh!)
(They... they found us...)
(Shush!)
Over here! I found 'em!
...Nooooo!!!!
Aaah! No, don't...
Hiding in an alley?
Get out.
Aaaaahh...!
Did you really think we wouldn't find you there...?
Spanish: ¿De verdad pensabas que no te encontraríamos allí...?

English: I'm... I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!! Please, at least spare my child!
Spanish: ¡¡Lo... Lo siento!! ¡¡Lo siento mucho!! ¡Por favor, al menos perdona a mi hijo!

English: ...We need to stop this, now.
Amiya...
I'm aware of the risk, Instructor Dobermann.
Spanish: Soy consciente del riesgo, Instructora Dobermann.

English: It's just that... we don't have the luxury of sitting around waiting for Reunion to disband.
Spanish: Es sólo que... no podemos darnos el lujo de sentarnos a esperar a que Reunión se disuelva.

English: Additionally, nobody knows how long this situation will last...
Spanish: Además, nadie sabe cuánto durará esta situación...

English: Therefore, the best course of action would be to take out the enemy and then get moving. Wouldn't you agree?
Spanish: Por lo tanto, el mejor curso de acción sería eliminar al enemigo y luego movernos. ¿No estás de acuerdo?

English: Understood. I'll follow your command.
All squads, listen up.
We have the element of surprise – these Reunion members don't know that we're here yet.
Spanish: Tenemos el elemento sorpresa - estos miembros de Reunión no saben que estamos aquí todavía.

English: Remember, be decisive! Take them out, cleanly and swiftly.
Spanish: ¡Recuerden, sean decisivos! Elimínenlos, limpia y rápidamente.

English: Dr {nombre}, gather your team. It's time for you to prove yourself.
Spanish: Dr. {nombre}, reúna a su equipo. Es hora de que demuestres tu valía.

English: We have no more time to second-guess ourselves.
Spanish: No tenemos más tiempo para dudar de nosotros mismos.

English: You should have told me sooner.
A simple matter. I'll handle this.
Spanish: Un asunto sencillo. Yo me encargo de esto.

English: Hah.
Amiya, I'm counting on you.
Understood.
"Silent we shall be, should conflict be avoidable––
Spanish: "¡Permaneceremos en silencio si el conflicto puede evitarse…

English: ––but fight tooth and nail, should it be necessary!"
Spanish: ––pero lucharemos con uñas y dientes si es necesario!"

English: Rhodes Island's creed... has always been the same!
Spanish: ¡El credo de Rhodes Island... siempre ha sido el mismo!
